focus_follows_cursor.title: focus follows cursor
focus_follows_cursor.description: Whether to automatically focus windows underneath the cursor

cursor_follows_focus.title: cursor follows focus
cursor_follows_focus.description: Whether to jump the cursor between windows focused by the WM

toggle_workspace_on_refocus.title: toggle workspace on refocus
toggle_workspace_on_refocus.description: Whether to switch back and forth between the previously focused workspace when focusing the current workspace

show_floating_on_top.title: show floating on top
show_floating_on_top.description: Whether to show floating windows as always on top

floating_window_move_amount.title: floating window move amount
floating_window_move_amount.description: Amount to move floating windows by

center_new_floating_windows.title: center new floating windows
center_new_floating_windows.description: Whether to center new floating windows

window_animations.title: window animations
window_animations.description: Whether to globally enable window transition animations
